name: Villager Fear
description: Villagers are scared of you and iron golems will attack you

actions.command: data modify storage hated vill set value {Type: "trading", Value: -200}
data modify storage hated vill.Target set from entity @s UUID
execute as @e[type=minecraft:villager] run data modify entity @s Gossips append from storage minecraft:hated vill
execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=..10] run data modify entity @s AngerTime set value 60
execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=..10] run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @p UUID
execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=10..20] run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @s UUID
execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=10..20] run data modify entity @s AngerTime set value 0
